desc:
When the wearer's turn starts, regenerates #5[i] Energy. If the enemy target has a Weakness implanted by the wearer, increases the wearer's DMG dealt to it by #3[i]%.
When an enemy target gets attacked by the wearer, the wearer decreases the target's DEF by #2[i]%, lasting for #4[i] turn(s). The same types of effects cannot stack.
